alert.note: Alert for Northern Fairfield (Connecticut) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 05 at 6:01PM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Fairfield and northern Westchester Counties through 645 PM EDT... At 601 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Ridgefield, or 9 miles south of Danbury, moving east at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Ridgefield around 625 PM EDT. Wilton and Georgetown around 635 PM EDT. Weston and Redding around 645 PM EDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
